name: 苏珊·B·安东尼
bio: 美国女权运动的核心领袖。终身未婚，将一生献给争取女性选举权的事业。她组织集会、发行报纸、在全国巡回演讲超过50年。1872年因'非法投票'被捕，引起全国关注。虽然未能亲眼看到第19修正案通过，但她点燃的火焰最终照亮了美国半数人口的政治权利。
bio_en: Women's rights activist who dedicated her life to securing women's right to vote. Co-founded the National Woman Suffrage Association with Elizabeth Cady Stanton. Arrested for voting illegally in 1872. Though she died 14 years before the 19th Amendment was ratified, it is commonly known as the 'Susan B. Anthony Amendment.'

personalEvents.title: 参加塞内卡瀑布大会
personalEvents.description: 出席美国第一次女权大会，从此投身女权运动
personalEvents.description_en: Attended America's first women's rights convention, beginning her lifelong commitment to the movement

personalEvents.title: 创办《革命报》
personalEvents.description: 创办女权报纸，口号：'男人的权利不多不少，女人的权利不多不少'
personalEvents.description_en: Founded women's rights newspaper with the motto: 'Men their rights and nothing more; women their rights and nothing less'

personalEvents.title: 非法投票被捕
personalEvents.description: 以女性身份投票被捕，庭审成为全国焦点
personalEvents.description_en: Arrested for voting as a woman, her trial became a national sensation

personalEvents.title: 提出宪法修正案
personalEvents.description: 推动在国会提出女性选举权修正案（即后来的第19修正案）
personalEvents.description_en: Pushed for introduction of women's suffrage amendment in Congress (later became the 19th Amendment)

personalEvents.title: 逝世
personalEvents.description: 临终前说：'失败是不可能的。'14年后第19修正案通过
personalEvents.description_en: Died saying 'Failure is impossible.' The 19th Amendment passed 14 years later
